title: Should You Still Be Listening to Dave Ramsey?
itunes:title: Should You Still Be Listening to Dave Ramsey?
description:
We're looking at what others are saying, and our own experiences, to find the radical middle on what has been (and continues to be) a bit of a touchy subject. Rest assured, personal choice and freedom to find your own path on your financial journey is and always will be the way of the Frugal Friends.

Get full show notes here!

  • Get our FREE 7-Day No-Spend Challenge Workbook here! https://www.frugalfriendspodcast.com/free 
  • Join the waitlist for Club BFF: https://www.frugalfriendspodcast.com/club-bff-waitlist/ 
  • Subscribe for more on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/frugalfriends 
  • Hang out with us on Instagram! https://www.instagram.com/frugalfriendspodcast/ 
  • Capitalize: https://www.frugalfriendspodcast.com/capitalize

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
